decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: A-EG-031-SL-100 Rev 00 Site Location Plan; A-041-BP-002 Rev 00 Site Plan (Block Plan); A-EG-041-PL-100 Rev 00 Survey as Existing Ground Floor Plan; A-EG-041-PL-110 Rev 00 Proposed Design Ground Floor Plan; A-EG-041-S-200 Rev 00 Survey as Existing Sections A-A and B-B; A-EG-041-S-210 Rev 00 Proposed Design Sections A-A & B-B; A-EG-041-EL-300 Rev 00 Survey as Existing Front, Rear & Side Elevations; A-EG-041-EL-310 Rev 01 Proposed Design Front, Rear & Side Elevations; Heritage Statement; EX-EG-A-041 Rev 00 Design and Access Statement prepared by MGDC Ltd dated June 2021; Parking Provision.

REASON: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless specified on the application form.

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Development Management DPD (2013), policies D3, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 1.1 (g), 2.1 (c) and 2.10 of the Adopted Core Strategy (2012). | No part of the flat roofs of the hereby approved development shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

REASON: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with policies 7A, 7B and 7D of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013) and policy D6 of the London Plan (2021).
application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
description: Single storey rear infill extension; alternations to side and rear fenestration.
